title: Ten Gods - Novel Updates
genre: Action   Adventure   Harem   Martial Arts   Xianxia
tags: Alchemy   Arranged Marriage   Artifacts   Betrayal   Body Tempering   Broken Engagement   Cultivation   Demons   Gods   Handsome Male Lead   Hard-Working Protagonist   Immortals   Male Protagonist   Multiple Realms   Revenge   Ruthless Protagonist   Sword Wielder   Transmigration   Transported to Another World   Unique Cultivation Technique   Weak to Strong
author: 贪睡的龙
description: In Ten Heavens Domain, full of respected powerhouses, Ling Tian accidentally obtained a mysterious iron sword. He refined the Supreme Martial Dao, studied the Divine Spirit Array Laws, fought Ten Thousand proud and arrogant Heavenly Clans, and was undefeated! Seven Feet Sword Tip sweeps away the world, within the Ten Heavens, I am the Supreme God Monarch!>
